It’s actually even prettier than I thought it would be. The flowy sleeves are gorgeous this way. I’m super pleased. It’s still very modest but if you truly want opaque maybe don’t take the risk. If you want a gorgeous dress that is probably going to fit you (bodice is expandable), def buy this.
